text: This felt relevant to this channel as well.

Hi!

I need your assistane to create similar functionality of this page <https://www.thejuicycrab.com/online-ordering/>
 on HubSpot. this is our current website is in different platform and we
 are copying this website to husbpot so need to copy the same
functionaailty. Can you please assist the best solution for this?
 User
 are seacrching by the GEO location for nearby restaurents and on that
listing we have order now button in front of each location and user
click to that order now button and redirect to external link.
Thanks

hey there, <@U020JQLFQ0P> looks like you’re looking to hire a developer. I’d suggest posting in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> . Additionally check our solutions partner directory and specifically look for partners that have website development as one of their services
<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/website-development>
